long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Copy Tabs: Efficiently Copy  Your Browser Tabs
Copy Tabs: 高效复制你的浏览器标签页

Have you ever been in a predicament where you need to copy and save a large number of tabs at once? Or when you switch between different devices, how do you keep those important tabs synchronized? Now, with the Copy Tabs extension, everything becomes easy and simple!

Core Functions:

One-click copy of all tabs: Just click the extension button, and you can copy the links of all open tabs in the current window to the clipboard, easily saving or sharing them with others.

Custom formats: Copy Tabs offers the option of customizing the copy format, allowing you to choose TEXT or JSON and customize the format to meet different needs.

Synchronize tabs: Whether you need to transfer tabs to another browser or from desktop to mobile, Copy Tabs can give you a helping hand. Through simple copy-paste operations, you can seamlessly switch and synchronize your browser tabs between multiple devices.

Group management: If you like to group multiple tabs by topic or project, Copy Tabs provides a convenient grouping function to make each copy more organized.

Usage scenarios:

Project managers: Need to quickly switch between multiple websites and maintain access to all resources? Copy Tabs will be your ideal tool to ensure that every tab in the project can be accessed at any time.

Researchers: Need to save multiple academic resources, articles or websites for comparison? Copy Tabs can help you quickly save a whole day's research materials and avoid losing any information.

Travellers and remote workers: By copying and synchronizing tabs, you can continue your work on different devices or easily restore previously opened pages on a new device.

Simple operation and efficiency improvement:

After adding and enabling the extension on the browser, users only need to click the extension icon to easily copy all the tab links of the current window. Then, you can paste these links anywhere, such as note apps, documents, emails, etc.

Summary: Whether you need to improve work efficiency or want to maintain flexibility among multiple tabs, Copy Tabs is a perfect solution. It makes browser management simpler and helps you easily copy, synchronize and organize tabs.

Install Copy Tabs immediately and enjoy a smarter browsing experience
